Notes: If SMInct_IncentiveElig_v1r0 is 1, SMInct_Round_v1r0 = 0 and RcrtES_Site_v1r0 is 8 then SMInct_NORCInctElig_v1r0 is 0; if SMInct_IncentiveElig_v1r0 is 1 and SMInct_Round_v1r0 = 0  and RcrtES_Site_v1r0 ne 8 then SMInct_NORCInctElig_v1r0 is 1
Derivation Notes: This variable is needed to exclude UChicago participants from NORC's incentive list. It is repeated measures associated with Round. Additional derivations will be developed for follow-up Rounds.
